thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Remi Fourquet
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Remi Fourquet

author: Remi Fourquet
title: Remi Fourquet
text:
Without being long.. Great customer service on 5 Omega agencies I went through during my trip from North to South, very helpful and nice at anytime, cheaper than others and no problems with any of my 3 cars. Feeling that they are not trying to take some money from you but that you pay for the service and for what it is. Shuttles right on time, free, nice drivers, out of the crowded terminals.
Thanks
